resources.string: Thank you for downloading our app./n I hope you like it. We will be updating it with the new chaos lists soon!

Hey there, thanks for downloading my app. This is a collaboration between myself and my friend Joe. Joe made the list of effects, and I built the app. I hope you have as much fun using it as we did making it. I\'ll be updating the app with new features and effects soon, so stay tuned!
For feature requests, to report bugs and to access to the source code, check out my github at github.com/agoodman42
You can reach me by email at goodman.business.info@gmail.com
